name: Blimpo Forest
description:
BLIMPO FOREST About:

Take care of your Blimpo's in this little slice of the sky! A game inspired by the Chao Garden from Sonic Adventure, you can feed your Blimpos fruits for more stats, and watch their bodies change to fit each stat As they age they will grow more and more, and eventually turn into a tree to populate a whole forest! How many Blimpos can YOU raise?

Controls:

WASD to move,

Mouse to rotate and pan camera,

X and Z for interactions.

This game was made for the Global Game Jam 2023

Blimpo Designs by Blobhouse: https://www.instagram.com/blobhouse/?hl=en
